metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6512 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
Race condition in the rmtree and remove_tree functions in the File-Pathmodule before 2.13 for Perl allows attackers to set the mode on arbitraryfiles via vectors involving directory-permission loosening logic.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6512` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libperl5.22 - 5.22.1-9ubuntu0.3
perl - 5.22.1-9ubuntu0.3
perl-base - 5.22.1-9ubuntu0.3
perl-debug - 5.22.1-9ubuntu0.3
perl-modules-5.22 - 5.22.1-9ubuntu0.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: perl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '5.22.1-9ubuntu0.3').
